title: loll_l
author: loll_l
content: I want to buy around $50 of both WASSIE and BOB through Uniswap but the gas fees are $25 for each transaction!!Is there any way to get WASSIE and BOB without having to spend so much on gas fees?

comments.author: adaseb
comments.body: Basically unless it’s listed somewhere like a CEX or unless it’s also on another chain like BNB or ARB then you are basically forced to pay that fee.Earlier today if you wanted PEPE with Uniswap you were paying almost $100 just for the transaction fee. Basically Defi is not good for small purchases and especially on the ETH main net.

comments.author: Apocollapse
comments.body: If you want to buy a coin without a gas fees, it's 100% impossible. But if you want to buy a coin without pay too much gas fees, you can. You have two options, it's either you buy through a centralized exchange, using other chain, or trade with user in this forum. Wassie don't get listed in any centralized exchange [1] while BOB, you have a choice to use Polygon or BSC network [2]. But why you're want to buy BOB? it's a stable coin.[1] https://coinmarketcap.com/currencies/wassie/markets/[2] https://coinmarketcap.com/currencies/bob/markets/

comments.author: livingfree
comments.body: Buy from someone directly so it's gonna be P2P and let the seller shoulder the fees. But being it quite high today, I don't think that someone's gonna do that unless you know him and he don't mind paying such fees. Quote from: Apocollapse on May 06, 2023, 09:12:45 AM But why you're want to buy BOB? it's a stable coin.[2] https://coinmarketcap.com/currencies/bob/markets/I think he's talking about another meme coin and this is the BOB token that I've found.https://coinmarketcap.com/currencies/bob1/But regardless of what coin is that @OP, everything now isn't for free even in transacting Bitcoin. The fees are high too as well.

comments.author: MAAManda
comments.body: Quote from: loll_l on May 06, 2023, 02:40:53 AMIs there any way to get WASSIE and BOB without having to spend so much on gas fees?To get the tokens you say at a low cost, you can use the CEX that listed them. But, as far as my search goes, $WASSIE is not registered with any CEX yet, so, if you want to own $WASSIE, you have to be prepared to incur the high transaction fees you say.Unlike the $BOB token which has been listed on several CEXs such as Poloniex and LBank, you can buy this token at a low cost by buying it through those exchanges.
